about_the_game:
Tikus Tales is a single-player/2-player split-screen couch co-op 3D action platformer game about a mouse and a squirrel that are unwittingly thrust into the role of recovering a stolen relic. The game is a mixture of platforming, combat and puzzle solving, with boss fights thrown into the mix and collectibles to be found.

You play as Tikus and/or Too-pie, a mouse and squirrel who unwillingly get chosen by an alien race to retrieve a stolen relic. The aliens' advanced technology grants Tikus and Too-pie super-abilities, in addition to enhancing their battle prowess. They must master their skills and various weapons if they ever hope to return to their mundane life of enjoying cheese and being just ordinary.


Jump, roll, climb and grapple your way through worlds of varying themes, ranging from semi-realistic ones like an ordinary house to outrageous ones like sky islands and lava filled caves. Face off against weaklings and powerful enemies, and collect resources that can be exchanged for various items in the in-game shop. Befriend other critters to aid in your adventures and solve puzzles designed to hinder your advancement. Become an expert mouse and squirrel duo, and show the aliens that you may be tiny, but no task is too big!

Key features of the game include:
-Colorful Worlds: Deliberately crafted in a low-poly style to be as pleasing to the eyes as possible
-Cute Enemies: Including, but not limited to martial-art monkeys, ninja frogs, squishy birds and ghostly teddies
-Challenging Boss Fights: Designed to test your skills and reflexes
-Secrets: For you to find out!

name: Tikus Tales

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

The game is a mixture of platforming, combat and puzzle solving, with boss fights and collectibles to be found.
